disc.accuracy.text: Nutritional estimates are based on visual analysis and may not be completely accurate. Actual nutritional content may vary based on preparation methods, portion sizes, and ingredient variations.
disc.feature.calories: • Calorie Tracking: Estimates based on visual food analysis
disc.feature.limits: • Calorie Limits: Default values or personalized calculations based on health data
disc.feature.macros: • Nutritional Analysis: Macronutrient breakdown using AI image recognition
disc.feature.plans: • Personalized Plans: Optional BMR-based calorie recommendations using user health data
disc.feature.recommendations: • Dietary Recommendations: General suggestions based on nutritional guidelines
disc.feature.weight: • Weight Tracking: User-input data for personal monitoring
disc.medical.text: Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider before making any changes to your diet or nutrition plan, especially if you have medical conditions, allergies, or dietary restrictions.
disc.notice.text: This app provides general nutritional information and dietary suggestions for educational purposes only. The information is not intended to replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
disc.title: Health Information Disclaimer
feedback.field.label: Your Feedback
feedback.placeholder: Tell us what you think about the app, any issues you've encountered, or features you'd like to see...
feedback.subtitle: Help us improve your experience
feedback.title: Share Your Feedback

onboarding.alcohol.desc: Ara l-istorja fil-kalendarju; il-kulur tal-ħġieġ juri r-reċenza.
onboarding.alcohol.title: Traċċar tal-alkoħol 🍷
onboarding.complete.desc: Lesti biex tibda? Tista’ dejjem terġa’ tiftaħ it-tutorjal mis-settings.
onboarding.complete.title: Kollox lest! 🎉
onboarding.datamode.desc: Pick how much detail you want to see. You can change this later in your profile.
onboarding.datamode.title: Choose Your Data Mode 📈
onboarding.disclaimer.desc: L-app ma tissostitwixxix parir mediku. Ikkonsulta professjonist.
onboarding.disclaimer.title: Dikjarazzjoni tas-saħħa importanti ⚠️
onboarding.friends.desc: Żid ħbieb u aqsam mil-lista; agħżel sehem.
onboarding.friends.title: Aqsam l-ikliet mal-ħbieb 🤝
onboarding.health_form.desc: Ipprovdi informazzjoni bażika għal rakkomandazzjonijiet personalizzati.
onboarding.health_form.title: Id-dejta tas-saħħa tiegħek 📝
onboarding.health_results.desc: Ibbażat fuq id-dejta — rakkomandazzjonijiet għal saħħa ottimali.
onboarding.health_results.title: Il-pjan personalizzat tiegħek 🎯
onboarding.health_setup.desc: Rakkomandazzjonijiet tal-kaloriji skont id-dejta tiegħek (mhux obbligatorju).
onboarding.health_setup.title: Konfigurazzjoni personalizzata tas-saħħa 📋
onboarding.insights.desc: Xejriet, profil u informazzjoni tas-saħħa — għall-għanijiet tiegħek.
onboarding.insights.title: Għarfien personalizzat 💡
onboarding.language.desc: Agħżel il-lingwa preferuta tiegħek. Tista' tibdilha aktar tard fit-tgħallim.
onboarding.language.title: Agħżel il-Lingwa 🌐
onboarding.notifications.desc: Enable reminders to snap your meals: breakfast (by 12), lunch (by 17), and dinner (by 21). We'll only remind you if you haven't snapped food yet. You can change this later in settings.
onboarding.notifications.title: Stay on Track with Gentle Reminders ⏰
onboarding.recognition.desc: Iffotografa l-ikel — l-AI tirrikonoxxih u tirreġistra l-kaloriji awtomatikament.
onboarding.recognition.title: Rikonoxximent intelliġenti tal-ikel 📸
onboarding.skip.message: Tista' dejjem taċċessa dan it-tutorial aktar tard mis-settings tal-profil tiegħek.
onboarding.skip.title: Aqbeż l-introduzzjoni?
onboarding.tracking.desc: Kaloriji ta’ kuljum u piż — kollox awtomatizzat!
onboarding.tracking.title: Segwi l-progress tiegħek 📊
onboarding.welcome.desc: Il-kumpann intelliġenti tal-ikel tiegħek: segwi kaloriji, moniterja l-piż u agħżel aktar b'saħħtu. Ejja nagħmlu dawra qasira!
onboarding.welcome.title: Merħba f'Eateria! 🍎
